title: Christmas roast roots with chestnuts
ingredients: ['1 parsnip, diced', '1 leek, sliced thickly', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '50g (2 oz) butter', '2 carrots, diced', '325g (11 1/2 oz) Brussels sprouts', '200g (7 oz) chestnuts (peeled and cooked)', '1 tablespoon Seville orange marmalade', '150ml (1/4 pint) chicken or vegetable stock']
